title: Mitchell Tribe Timeline
description: Posts from Mastodon for Micro.blog timeline

items.content_html: Quick reminder: I migrated my Bluesky account to my self-hosted PDS ⚙️, but the Bluesky app cannot authenticate afterward and throws "JWT signature does not match issuer."  I have contacted support to revert my DID back to the hosted PDS so I can log in again. Until then, I can't access my Bluesky account.  # Bluesky    # PDS    # SelfHosting    # ATProto
